titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections Ms2017-049

defitem.label: Processed by: Kira A. Dietz, Archivist

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection contains a resume and portfolio of work created by Cary P. McCutcheon, a landscape architect in Virginia, in 2012.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The ability publish or exhibit material from the Cary P. McCutcheon Portfolio is limited by current U. S. copyright law. Please contact Special Collections for more information.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Cary P. McCutcheon Portfolio, Ms2017-049, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Cary P. McCutcheon Portfolio was donated to Special Collections in May 2015.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Cary P. McCutcheon Portfolio was completed in October 2017.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Cary P. McCutcheon was born in 1957. McCutcheon graduate from Virginia Tech in 1985 with a Masters in Landscape Architecture and, for over 25 years, worked as a landscape architect, first in North Carolina, and later (mostly) in Virginia. McCutcheon died in 2013.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains a resume and portfolio of work created by Cary P. McCutcheon, a landscape architect in Virginia, in 2012. There is a four page resume, as well as color and black and white drawings, pictures, and print-outs of designs and spaces, primarily completed around the Richmond, Virginia, area.
